titles.title: My Gracious Lord I Own Thy Right (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My gracious Lord I own Thy right To every service I can pay And call it my supreme delight To hear thy dictates and obey{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What is my being but for Thee Its sure support its noblest end 'Tis my delight Thy face to see And serve the cause of such a Friend{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis to my Savior I would live To Him who for my ransom died Nor could all worldly honor give Such bliss as crowns me at His side{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His work my hoary age shall bless When youthful vigor is no more And my last hour of life confess His dying love His saving powr{/lang-eng}
